around here is creepy enough

Captain Kellogg,

Hey guys, we got a problem!

DRAKE: Fair enough,

You'd be much more comfortable

DRAKE: Oh, we wouldn't do that.

um...

oh whatever, c'mon, we gotta

It's not like we haven't all

bet you're glad we're in

I didn't invent the ravages of

One, I didn't invent whatever

not really liking your tone!

Firing an ion cannon at the

So tell me, if you kill her,

The Intrepid is the key to

ARCHER: And at least your own

You are going to fly us back to

What? Wait,
